alert.note: Alert for Chaves County Plains; Curry County; De Baca County; Eastern Lincoln County; Roosevelt County; South Central Mountains; Southwest Chaves County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 1:48PM MST until March 11 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches except for 2 to 4 inches over the South Central Mountains, Eastern Lincoln and Southwest Chaves Counties. * WHERE...South Central Mountains, Curry County, Roosevelt County, De Baca County, Chaves County Plains, Eastern Lincoln County and Southwest Chaves County. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for New Mexico can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, 1-800-432-4269, or visiting nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Chaves County Plains; Curry County; De Baca County; Eastern Lincoln County; Roosevelt County; South Central Mountains; Southwest Chaves County
